item.title: AWS account security
item.description: Securing AWS Env Deploying an infra, is almost pretty straight forward now a days. There are multiple tools which helps you to automate the things and manage it in better way and update regularly. But talking about the data transport, many people take about the account and data security. If you re setting up an infra on AWS, you might be interested in implement following things to make you AWS infra more secure

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: It’s not about me, actually we are a team of DevOps practitioners, who love to build the simple solution to the complex problems or in the other can say to build the solution which can be adopt easily by dev+ops team and improve the productivity and the work efficiency. We work across multiple devops tools, technology and cloud services. Buildig the automation to deploy cloud services, define security practices, setup DR practices, Continous monitoring and alerting system, Helping dev to deploy applications as micro serivces and end-to-end Infra Migration and more.
